title: Deluxe Canvas
description1: Deluxe Canvas is a luxury art brand that offers premium wall canvases and fine art prints. The project focused on crafting a high-end Shopify experience that aligns with the brand’s bold and artistic aesthetic.
myGoal: My goal was to create a premium Shopify storefront that reflects exclusivity, visual storytelling, and product craftsmanship.
description2: The design emphasizes a modern layout with smooth transitions, elegant typography, and optimized navigation. Dynamic animations and storytelling elements immerse users in the artistic experience, boosting brand engagement and conversions.

title: Frag Perfumes
description1: Frag Perfumes blends nature-inspired elegance with minimal luxury. This Shopify build captures the brand’s emotional connection through soft tones, natural aesthetics, and seamless product storytelling.
myGoal: My goal was to develop a visually refined eCommerce store that expresses purity, luxury, and emotional depth through scent.
description2: The layout emphasizes simplicity and user comfort, using a gentle color palette and intuitive navigation. From homepage to checkout, the experience was optimized for engagement and high conversion rates.

title: Say Hay
description1: Say Hay is a fresh juice and wellness brand that promotes health and organic living. This project focused on minimal, modern design and a clean Shopify structure to align with their fresh brand tone.
myGoal: My goal was to deliver a sleek, conversion-focused Shopify experience that communicates wellness and modern simplicity.
description2: The result is a bright, minimal site featuring crisp typography, optimized images, and fluid user navigation that encourages exploration and engagement.

title: Sharky
description1: Sharky is a startup brand offering marine-inspired products. The project was designed to deliver a youthful, bold, and adventurous online presence using Shopify’s dynamic eCommerce framework.
myGoal: My goal was to build a high-performing Shopify store with a fun, confident brand personality and modern UI.
description2: Vibrant ocean tones, strong typography, and interactive sections create a brand experience that captures Sharky’s energy and mission. The site is optimized for speed, engagement, and visual impact.
